channel.title: For loop on Eunhan's library
channel.description: Recent content in For loop on Eunhan's library

item.title: [JAVA code]for loop
item.description: variables in for statement will not keep memory after loop is finished break : finish the whole loop continue : skip last and move to next loop 0~9 loop for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { } 10~0 loop for (int i = 10; i > -1; i--) { } only read the arr, cannot modify for (String str : arr) { }
